attributes.action: appoint Brian Blessed as the Speaker of the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Michael Martin MP to be replaced by Mr Brian Blessed as Speaker.  Mr Blessed is a wholly more suitable man, and is equipped with a truly remarkable voice; a geniune asset to any Speaker.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
